alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 21 at 3:13AM CDT until August 21 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING ISSUED FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES TODAY DUE TO A COMBINATION OF HIGH KDBI VALUES, SIGNIFICANTLY INCREASING DROUGHT CONDITIONS, AND INCREASING WINDS... ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM THIS MORNING TO 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR STONE, GEORGE, AND PERRY COUNTIES IN SOUTHEASTERN MISSISSIPPI... The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from 10 AM this morning to 9 PM CDT this evening. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 075, 078 and 079. * WINDS...Southeast up to 10 mph with gusts up to 20 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 34 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop will likely spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not recommended.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
